alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Marshall and southeastern Kittson Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Old Mill State Park, or 24 miles northwest of Thief River Falls, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Strandquist around 220 PM CDT. Karlstad around 230 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Minnesota.
